name: babylon-bulletphysics
description: babylon.js v2 physics custom backend using bulletphysics

scripts.build: cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-Ctarget-feature=+simd128,+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" webpack --env production --env wasmInstance=md && copyfiles netlify.toml test_dist
scripts.build-wasm-sr: cd src/wasm_src && rimraf ../wasm/sr  && cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-Ctarget-feature=+simd128"                                        wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-dir ../wasm/sr  --out-name index -- --no-default-features                                                          && cd ../../../..
scripts.build-wasm-sd: cd src/wasm_src && rimraf ../wasm/sd  && cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-Ctarget-feature=+simd128"                                        wasm-pack build --target web --debug   --out-dir ../wasm/sd  --out-name index -- --no-default-features --features "console_error_panic_hook"                  && cd ../../../..
scripts.build-wasm-mr: cd src/wasm_src && rimraf ../wasm/mr  && cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-Ctarget-feature=+simd128,+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-dir ../wasm/mr  --out-name index -- --no-default-features --features "parallel"                                  && cd ../../../..
scripts.build-wasm-md: cd src/wasm_src && rimraf ../wasm/md  && cross-env RUSTFLAGS="-Ctarget-feature=+simd128,+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals" wasm-pack build --target web --debug   --out-dir ../wasm/md  --out-name index -- --no-default-features --features "console_error_panic_hook parallel"         && cd ../../../..
scripts.build-wasm-all: npm run build-wasm-sr && npm run build-wasm-sd && npm run build-wasm-mr && npm run build-wasm-md
scripts.build-umd: webpack --env production --config webpack.lib.config.ts && webpack --env development --config webpack.lib.config.ts
scripts.build-lib: rimraf dist && npm run build-wasm-all && npm run build-esm && npm run build-umd

author: noname0310
